author: Jason Platt
comment: I've been looking for a realistic watch face, and this one looks great on my Nixon Mission. I like the ambient options, but what's missing is a way to override the dim timer. As it is now, the watch face dims very quickly. I'd like to be able to set the timer to 7 or 10 seconds (as is an option in many other watch faces).
title: Almost perfect
